Title: Community Redevelopment Authority Areas [Nebraska--Grand Island]
Description: Map contains the boundary for the Community Redevelopment Authority (CRA) Blight & Substandard areas for the City of Grand Island. A direct link to documents containing information on each of the CRA's Blight & Substandard study is attached to the area's boundary. Tax Increment Financing Projects associated with the CRA areas are also included in the map
Creator: City of Grand Island
Provider: City of Grand Island Public GIS Data Portal
